articles.title: California Attorney General Rob Bonta says Florida responsible for flying migrants to Sacramento - KABC-TV
articles.description: Attorney General Rob Bonta said the state of Florida appears to have arranged for a group of South American migrants to be dropped off outside a Sacramento church.
articles.content:
SACRAMENTO -- California's attorney general said the state of Florida appears to have arranged for a group of South American migrants to be dropped off outside a Sacramento church.

articles.author: Michelle Starr
articles.title: Abnormal Surge of Brain Abscesses in American Children, CDC Says - ScienceAlert
articles.description: Following the easing of pandemic restrictions in the US, cases of brain abscess in children under 18 have risen to new heights, according to a pair of CDC reports.
articles.content:
Following the easing of pandemic restrictions in the US, cases of brain abscess in children under 18 have risen to new heights, according to a pair of CDC reports.
